alert.note: Alert for Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard County through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Suntree, or near Patrick Air Force Base, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach, Satellite Beach and Merritt Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
